titles.title: A resolution recognizing the University of Iowa women's basketball team's historic "Crossover at Kinnick" game and the importance of women's sports.
A resolution recognizing the University of Iowa women's basketball team's historic "Crossover at Kinnick" game and the importance of women's sports.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the University of Iowa women's basketball team for setting the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) women's basketball attendance record at the Crossover at Kinnick event. The Crossover at Kinnick event was the first women's basketball game played outdoors in a football stadium.
